==Detailed Show Notes==

Dan and Jordan explore Alex Jones' latest visit to Joe Rogan's podcast, where all sorts of bullshit got discussed.<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2020/10/30/episode-497-joe-rogan-part-3 Episode 497: Joe Rogan Part 3]</ref>

Topics covered include:

*Jim McKelvey, co-founder of Square, which owns Cash App, is [https://www.stlouisfed.org/about-us/leadership-governance/board-of-directors a board member of the St. Louis Federal Reserve Bank].
*Discussion of [https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2019/aug/22/the-murky-life-and-death-of-robert-maxwell-and-how-it-shaped-his-daughter-ghislaine the death of Robert Maxwell].
*[https://www.baltimoresun.com/news/bs-xpm-2002-12-08-0212110428-story.html Michael Pakenham's review] of the book about Robert Maxwell being a spy.
*A [https://web.archive.org/web/20040215191237/http://www.crimelibrary.com/criminal_mind/psychology/mcmartin_daycare/5.html?sect=19 breakdown of the events] in the McMartin Preschool trial
*[http://law2.umkc.edu/faculty/projects/ftrials/mcmartin/mcmartinaccount.html Further discussion] of the McMartin trial
*[https://www.latimes.com/archives/la-xpm-1990-05-06-op-35-story.html 1990 LA Times article] about the political background of the McMartin prosecution
*Ted Gunderson [http://rigorousintuition.blogspot.com/2005/07/interview-with-jackie-mcgauley-part_19.html lived with one of the parents of a McMartin student] who was involved with the project to dig up the alleged tunnels
*The [https://mds.marshall.edu/cgi/viewcontent.cgi?article=1006&context=psychology_faculty&httpsredir=1&referer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com%2F archaeological report on the McMartin tunnels] is questionable
*[https://www.propublica.org/article/we-found-a-staggering-281-lobbyists-whove-worked-in-the-trump-administration ProPublica article] about the 281 lobbyists who Trump has hired
*[https://www.politico.com/news/2020/07/08/trump-administration-veteranslobbying-348273 Politico article] about the 82 former Trump administration members who went on to be lobbyists
*[https://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-trump-daniels-at-t-exclusive/att-ceo-we-made-big-mistake-hiring-cohen-chief-lobbyist-out-idUSKBN1IC1L6 Reuters article] about ATT&T's payments to Michael Cohen
*There were articles about [https://www.bbc.com/news/world-middle-east-54151712 the recent peace deals]
*[https://www.justice.gov/archive/tax/usaopress/2004/txdv04kush0818_r.htm Jared Kushner's dad pled guilty] to trying to blackmail his sister's husband, who was a collaborating witness against him
*The magical Utah coal mine doesn't seem to be in [https://pubs.usgs.gov/pp/p1625b/Reports/Chapters/Chapter_B.pdf the USGS report]
*[https://www.americangeosciences.org/critical-issues/faq/which-states-are-largest-producers-and-consumers-coal Utah produces 2% of the US's annual coal]
*[https://www.popularmechanics.com/technology/infrastructure/news/a27886/how-does-clean-coal-work/ Clean coal doesn't mean what Alex thinks it does]
*The idea that [https://www.theguardian.com/weather/ng-interactive/2018/sep/11/atlantic-hurricanes-are-storms-getting-worse hurricanes are getting worse] is not "media hype"
*Alex is making things up about the Club of Rome's [http://www.donellameadows.org/wp-content/userfiles/Limits-to-Growth-digital-scan-version.pdf Limitations of Growth document]
*[https://vault.fbi.gov/the-finders The FBI's Finders files]
*[https://yaledailynews.com/blog/2010/08/09/judge-dismisses-apache-suit-against-skull-and-bones-2/ More information about the lawsuit] filed by Geronimo's great-grandson
*[https://news.google.com/newspapers?dat=19960430&hl=en&id=yDcxAAAAIBAJ&nid=348&pg=2925%2C9479409 AP article] about the search for William Colby's body
*[https://big.assets.huffingtonpost.com/PostMortem.pdf Medical Examiner's report] about William Colby
*The Rockefeller document that [https://www.rockefellerfoundation.org/wp-content/uploads/Annual-Report-2010-1.pdf Alex's conspiracy is not based on]
*The Rockefeller document that [https://issuu.com/dueprocesstv/docs/scenario-for_the-future Alex's Lock Step conspiracy is based on]
*An explanation of [https://www.who.int/news-room/q-a-detail/poliomyelitis-vaccine-derived-polio what vaccine-derived polio actually is]
